publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2519# Andrew Wilson: Scottish Number Plates-That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should recognise the importance of national symbols and the absolute right of people to identify with their country of choice and should detail what action it has undertaken thus far with the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency and Department for Transport, Local Government and the Regions to protect the rights of Scotland's people with vehicles registered here to display a Saltire and/or "SCO" on their vehicle number plates, and affirms that from this date the Scottish Executive should not accept or endorse any situation whereby these rights might be eroded. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Alasdair Morgan*, Fiona McLeod*, Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Richard Lochhead*, Linda Fabiani*, Colin Campbell*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Shona Robison*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2519# Scottish Number Plates (lodged on 4 December 2001) Fergus Ewing*, Stewart Stevenson*

S1M-2519# Andrew Wilson: Scottish Number Plates-That the Parliament considers that the Scottish Executive should recognise the importance of national symbols and the absolute right of people to identify with their country of choice and should detail what action it has undertaken thus far with the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency and Department for Transport, Local Government and the Regions to protect the rights of Scotland's people with vehicles registered here to display a Saltire and/or "SCO" on their vehicle number plates, and affirms that from this date the Scottish Executive should not accept or endorse any situation whereby these rights might be eroded. Supported by: Bruce Crawford, Alasdair Morgan, Fiona McLeod, Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Mr Andrew Welsh, Dr Winnie Ewing, Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Richard Lochhead, Linda Fabiani, Colin Campbell, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Ms Margo MacDonald, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Nicola Sturgeon, Shona Robison, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing, Stewart Stevenson
S1M-2519# Scottish Number Plates (lodged on 4 December 2001) Irene McGugan*
S1M-2519# Scottish Number Plates (lodged on 4 December 2001) Brian Adam*, Alex Neil*
S1M-2519# Scottish Number Plates (lodged on 4 December 2001) Fiona Hyslop*
